### createWideLoads() {#a5c200a0c8fab01de53c593549f4e6aa6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool HexagonLoadStoreWidening::createWideLoads (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">InstrGroup</a> &amp; OG, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">InstrGroup</a> &amp; NG, unsigned TotalSize)</>}>
Given an &quot;old group&quot; OG of loads, create a &quot;new group&quot; NG of instructions to replace them.

Ideally, NG would only have a single instruction in it, but that may only be possible for double register loads.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonloadstorewidening-cpp/#l00129">129</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonloadstorewidening-cpp">HexagonLoadStoreWidening.cpp</a>.

Given an &quot;old group&quot; OG of stores, create a &quot;new group&quot; NG of instructions to replace them.

Ideally, NG would only have a single instruction in it, but that may only be possible for store-immediate.

### selectInsts() {#a5a047520374472fcaaf967fb678d1a68}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool HexagonLoadStoreWidening::selectInsts (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#ac5b936169badf0b703567eb960278648">InstrGroup::iterator</a> Begin, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#ac5b936169badf0b703567eb960278648">InstrGroup::iterator</a> End, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">InstrGroup</a> &amp; OG, unsigned &amp; TotalSize, unsigned MaxSize)</>}>
Given a sequence of adjacent loads/stores, and a maximum size of a single wide inst, pick a group of insts that can be replaced by a single load/store of size not exceeding MaxSize.

The selected sequence will be recorded in OG (&quot;old group&quot; of instructions). OG should be empty on entry, and should be left empty if the function fails.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonloadstorewidening-cpp/#l00125">125</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonloadstorewidening-cpp">HexagonLoadStoreWidening.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
